articles.description: England took the handbrake off against the Republic of Ireland to leave their fans with plenty to be optimistic about after Lee Carsley's first game as interim boss.
articles.title: England 'take the handbrake off' to make positive start under Lee Carsley

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka wins her first US Open title as she puts the disappointment of last year's final behind her to hold off American home hope Jessica Pegula.
articles.title: US Open women's final 2024: Aryna Sabalenka holds off Jessica Pegula to win third Grand Slam title

articles.description: Former captain Michael Vaughan warns England not to "take the mickey out of the game" after a sloppy second day allows Sri Lanka back into the third Test.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: 'Don't take the mickey' - Michael Vaughan warns home side

articles.description: Para-athlete Hannah Cockroft stars for GB, storming to her ninth Paralympic title in a British one-two in the T34 800m.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Paralympics: Great Britain win 20 medals including five golds on day 10

articles.description: BBC Radio 5 Live's John Murray and Ian Dennis discuss what they saw in England's 2-0 win over the Republic of Ireland.
articles.title: Republic of Ireland 0-2 England: What BBC Radio 5 Live saw in Lee Carsley's first game

articles.description: Adrian Newey is paid more than most drivers on the F1 grid. Andrew Benson analyses what makes the man joining Aston Martin next year so successful - and so in demand.
articles.title: Adrian Newey: What makes 'visionary' F1 designer so special?

articles.description: Argentina overturn a 17-point deficit to condemn Australia to their heaviest Test defeat, with a thumping victory in the Rugby Championship.
articles.title: Argentina 67-27 Australia: Pumas inflict heaviest Test defeat on Wallabies

articles.description: BBC Scotland pundits give their thoughts ahead of Scotland's visit to Portugal in Nations League Group A1.
articles.title: What questions do Clarke's Scots face in Portugal?

articles.description: Great Britain's Hannah Cockroft wins her ninth career Paralympic gold medal as she leads home a British one-two in the T34 800m final at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: Great Britain's Hannah Cockroft wins T34 800m gold

articles.description: World number one Judd Trump wins a dramatic final frame on the black to beat Mark Williams and lift the inaugural Saudi Arabia Masters title.
articles.title: Judd Trump beats Mark Williams in Saudi Arabia Masters final
